content: Manly Fast Ferry services are reducing to an hourly time table. Allow plenty of additional travel time and be patient during your journey. Alternatively make other travel arrangements.
subtitle: Manly Fast Ferry

properties.speechText: The Circular Quay to Manly Fast Ferry services are reducing to an hourly time table. Allow plenty of additional travel time and be patient during your journey. Alternatively make other travel arrangements.

urlText: T2 Inner West & Leppington Line and T8 Airport & South Line
content:
Allow extra travel time away from the city due to track equipment repairs at St James. Customers travelling to Circular Quay, St James and Museum are being advised to utilise local buses or light rail from Central to complete journey.
Listen to announcements and check information displays for service updates as stopping patterns may change at short notice.
subtitle: T2 Inner West & Leppington Line and T8 Airport & South Line
